personal.name: Sergio Munoz
personal.summary: Senior GenAI, Observability, and Cloud/DevSecOps Engineer with 9+ years of experience designing and operating production-grade AI, data, and cloud-native systems. Specialized in Vector.dev and Elastic/ELK observability pipelines, large-scale ingestion/analytics systems, and LLM-powered applications (RAG, prompt lifecycle management) using LangChain and OpenAI/Azure OpenAI. Strong background in Python, Kubernetes, Terraform/Ansible, CI/CD (GitLab/GitHub Actions/Jenkins), and microservices. Proven ability to lead cross-functional teams, mentor engineers, and deliver secure, scalable solutions for enterprises and regulated environments.

experience.title: Senior Data Engineer
experience.description: Built and operated cloud-native observability/data pipelines for large-scale telemetry across multi-cloud environments.
achievements: Deployed decentralized Vector.dev instances on Kubernetes to ingest, transform, and route logs/metrics to systems across Azure, AWS, and Splunk
Transformed telemetry using VRL into standardized schemas (including security-oriented formats such as OCSF)
Implemented GitOps-style delivery where declarative configs were applied via GitHub Actions to multiple cloud providers
Built dashboards for health, throughput, and error-rate monitoring; configured alerting workflows routed through OpsGenie

experience.title: Senior DevSecOps Engineer
experience.description: Owned GenAI platform engineering, observability, and secure automation for cloud-native systems and internal products.
achievements: Deployed centralized Vector.dev pipelines to ingest, enrich, normalize, and route logs into Elasticsearch for unified observability and alerting
Built Python and Lua tooling for log enrichment, schema normalization, and intelligent routing based on patterns and telemetry types
Engineered full-stack AI applications and API services using FastAPI/Django/Node.js with modern front-ends (Vue/Nuxt/React)
Implemented LangChain-based RAG systems (ingestion, chunking, embeddings, retrieval, routing, memory, parsing) backed by Elasticsearch and MongoDB
Built IaC automation using Ansible/Terraform and managed edge/reverse proxies (Traefik/Nginx) and virtualization clusters (Virtio/Libvirt)
Improved reliability and debuggability via comprehensive logging/monitoring standards and CI/CD automation (GitLab/Jenkins)

experience.title: AI Solutions Architect (Senior)
experience.description: Customer-facing AI/solutions engineering and platform delivery across observability, analytics pipelines, and LLM productization.
achievements: Managed technical account relationships for 35–75+ enterprise clients, delivering training, monitoring, troubleshooting, and architectural guidance
Built ELK + MongoDB analytics pipelines (including NiFi-based ingestion) for AI usage analytics with real-time integrity monitoring
Integrated Azure OpenAI with secure logging layers for cross-cloud observability and governance
Designed and deployed a prompt lifecycle management system with telemetry and health checks to support RAG-based AI applications
Conducted pre/post-sales engineering: technical pitches, demos, prototypes, and rapid use-case analysis to optimize performance and uncover hidden costs
Helped drive internal AI initiatives and executive stakeholder communication

experience.title: Principal DevOps / Full Stack Engineer
experience.description: Architected data ingestion and analytics platforms for financial services clients (Capital One), focused on self-service insights and reliability.
achievements: Architected ingestion of structured and semi-structured data into unified repositories using Ansible and ELK on AWS
Built automated cleansing/enrichment pipelines applying advanced business logic for accuracy and reporting consistency
Designed KPI dashboards and scorecards (Grafana/Elasticsearch) enabling self-service analytics and faster decision-making
Orchestrated infrastructure via Terraform and CI/CD pipelines through GitLab

experience.title: Lead Software Engineer
experience.description: Led delivery of distributed cloud systems with strong CI/CD and observability foundations; mentored teams and drove performance improvements.
achievements: Built distributed cloud systems with Docker, GitLab, and Ansible; implemented 10+ services including Kafka, Redis, and Elasticsearch
Led Agile teams (5–12 members) and coordinated with stakeholders to deliver scalable solutions with monitoring and performance tooling
Developed Spring Boot microservices and full-stack integrations; streamlined CI/CD and reduced staging time from days to minutes via automation
Created predictive analytics (RNNs) to optimize AWS resource usage; delivered dashboards and a Flask app for real-time AWS metrics

experience.title: IT Specialist

Created ETL pipelines and compliance monitoring systems, reducing data validation time by ~90%
Developed batch-processing systems and Java-based compliance reporting tools; implemented secure FTP/SFTP workflows
Supported and maintained critical IT systems with focus on reliability and operational efficiency

experience.title: Manager

Reduced employee onboarding time from ~2 weeks to ~3 days through process optimization and documentation
Led marketing/PR/partnerships and built automation scripts for scheduled social posting
Reported directly to executive leadership with analysis and recommendations
